tool.name: SpectralCoefficient
tool.description: : Wrapper of the scikit-learn SpectralClustering method.

param.name: input_dataset_path
param.label: input CSV file
param.help: Path to the input dataset. Format: [input].csv

param.name: outname_output_results_path
param.label: output CSV name
param.help: Table with WCSS (elbow method), Gap and Silhouette coefficients for each cluster Format: [output].csv

param.name: outname_output_plot_path
param.label: output PNG name
param.help: Path to the elbow method and gap statistics plot Format: [output].png

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: predictors
param.label: predictors
param.help: Features or columns from your dataset you want to use for fitting. You can specify either a list of columns names from your input dataset, a list of columns indexes or a range of columns indexes. Formats: { "columns": ["column1", "column2"] } or { "indexes": [0, 2, 3, 10, 11, 17] } or { "range": [[0, 20], [50, 102]] }. In case of mulitple formats, the first one will be picked. (Json)

param.name: max_clusters
param.label: max_clusters
param.help: Maximum number of clusters to use by default for kmeans queries.

param.name: random_state_method
param.label: random_state_method
param.help: A pseudo random number generator used for the initialization of the lobpcg eigen vectors decomposition when *eigen_solver='amg'* and by the K-Means initialization.

param.name: scale
param.label: scale
param.help: Whether or not to scale the input dataset.
